subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Team New Zealand beat Mascalzone Latino of Italy by 12 seconds to take a 1-0 lead in their best-of-five final at the Louis Vuitton Trophy sailing regatta for America’s Cup teams.
snippet: Team New Zealand beat Mascalzone Latino of Italy by 12 seconds to take a 1-0 lead in their best-of-five final at the Louis Vuitton Trophy sailing regatta for America’s Cup teams.
